content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6015020,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f7fa17dc-bb03-48cf-b9d4-b015232e2fdb/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f7fa17dc-bb03-48cf-b9d4-b015232e2fdb/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f7fa17dc-bb03-48cf-b9d4-b015232e2fdb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":419.8131798852848},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WE are Noble.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" WE pursue code purity and the best possible impact from the work we do. WE value our colleagues and the Code of Conduct. WE answer the calls for help when we are needed the most.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WE are Wild at the core.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" WE take on the most complex tasks and dive deep with our heads under the surface in order to find the best solutions. WE are the ones who never hesitates discovering new worlds and horizons for EPAM and its clients.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WE are United.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" WE stand together as one big community of professionals with various skills in so many different areas — from Mechanical Engineering to Design and Quality Assurance. WE strive to combine our experiences into the best teams out there yet.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Last, but never the least — WE are Engineers.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" WE are making this world better with our solutions and strive for technological breakthroughs. WE might’ve got 99 problems, but a code ain’t one.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
